full_summary:
**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**
======================================

**Request for Proposal: RVDT Challenger Parts**
---------------------------------------------

### Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of RVDT equipment for the Challenger CL650 aircraft operated by Transport Canada. The purpose of this RFP is to acquire the necessary parts to maintain the aircraft's performance.

### Description of Requirements

The following parts are required:

* One (1) RVDT quantity 1 ea. (PN: 601R59333-1)
* One (1) RVDT quantity 1 ea. (PN: 601R59333-3)
* One (1) RVDT quantity 1 ea. (PN: 601R59333-5)
* One (1) RVDT quantity 1 ea. (PN: 601R75148-3)
* One (1) FORCE TRANSDUCER UNIT (AILERON - L/H) quantity 1 ea. (PN: 604-90402-5)
* One (1) FORCE TRANSDUCER UNIT (AILERON - R/H) quantity 1 ea. (PN: 604-90402-7)
* One (1) ELECTRONIC CONTROL UNIT CFMS quantity 1 ea. (PN: BA670-70285-7)
* One (1) FORCE TRANSDUCER UNIT (RUDDER) quantity 1 ea. (PN: BA670-93485-3)
* One (1) FORCE TRANSDUCER UNIT (ELEVATOR) quantity 1 ea. (PN: BA670-93485-3)

### Trade Agreement and Competitive Procurement Strategy

This RFP is open to Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders for the procurement of T8493-140035 series. The trade agreement applicable to this RFP is the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible, Suppliers must be on the permanent list or able to meet the qualification requirements.

### Contracting Authority

Edmond Egikian, Acquisitions Branch, Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector (LAEPSS), Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) / Government of Canada.

Contact Information:

* Phone: (343) 572-4437
* Email: [edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:edmond.egikian
